trans-unit.source: Specifies an Elliptic Curve Diffie-Hellman (ECDH) public key for use with the <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.ECDiffieHellmanCng" /> class.
trans-unit.target: 指定与 <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.ECDiffieHellmanCng" /> 类一起使用的椭圆曲线 Diffie-Hellman (ECDH) 公钥。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.ECDiffieHellmanCngPublicKey> objects are used in key exchanges with <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.ECDiffieHellmanCng> objects.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.ECDiffieHellmanCngPublicKey> 在使用的密钥交换中使用对象<xref:System.Security.Cryptography.ECDiffieHellmanCng>对象。

trans-unit.source: Gets the key BLOB format for a <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.ECDiffieHellmanCngPublicKey" /> object.
trans-unit.target: 获取 <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.ECDiffieHellmanCngPublicKey" /> 对象的密钥 BLOB 格式。

trans-unit.source: The format that the key BLOB is expressed in.
trans-unit.target: 表示密钥 BLOB 的格式。

trans-unit.source: Exports the key and explicit curve parameters used by the <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.ECCurve" /> object into an <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.ECParameters" /> object.
trans-unit.target: 将 <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.ECCurve" /> 对象使用的密钥和显式曲线参数导出到 <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.ECParameters" /> 对象。

trans-unit.source: The key and explicit curve parameters used by the <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.ECCurve" /> object.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.ECCurve" /> 对象使用的密钥和显式曲线参数。

trans-unit.source: The method cannot obtain curve values.
trans-unit.target: 此方法无法获取曲线值。

trans-unit.source: Explicit export is not supported by this platform.
trans-unit.target: 此平台不支持显式导出。

trans-unit.source: Windows 10 or higher is required.
trans-unit.target: 必须使用 Windows 10 或更高版本。

trans-unit.source: Exports the key used by the <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.ECCurve" /> object into an <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.ECParameters" /> object.
trans-unit.target: 将 <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.ECCurve" /> 对象使用的密钥导出到 <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.ECParameters" /> 对象。

trans-unit.source: The key and named curve parameters used by the <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.ECCurve" /> object.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.ECCurve" /> 对象使用的密钥和已命名曲线参数。

trans-unit.source: If the key was created as a named curve, the <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.ECParameters.Curve?displayProperty=nameWithType> field contains named curve parameters; otherwise, it contains explicit parameters.
trans-unit.target: 如果密钥被创建为命名曲线，<xref:System.Security.Cryptography.ECParameters.Curve?displayProperty=nameWithType>字段包含命名的曲线参数; 否则，它将包含显式的参数。

trans-unit.source: The method cannot obtain curve values.
trans-unit.target: 此方法无法获取曲线值。

trans-unit.source: A byte array that contains an Elliptic Curve Diffie-Hellman (ECDH) public key.
trans-unit.target: 一个包含椭圆曲线 Diffie-Hellman (ECDH) 公钥的字节数组。

trans-unit.source: An object that specifies the format of the key BLOB.
trans-unit.target: 一个指定密钥 BLOB 格式的对象。

trans-unit.source: Converts a byte array that contains a public key to a <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.ECDiffieHellmanCngPublicKey" /> object according to the specified format.
trans-unit.target: 根据指定的格式，将包含公钥的字节数组转换为 <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.ECDiffieHellmanCngPublicKey" /> 对象。

trans-unit.source: An object that contains the ECDH public key that is serialized in the byte array.
trans-unit.target: 一个包含 ECDH 公钥的对象，ECDH 公钥在字节数组中被序列化。

trans-unit.source: This static method is shared among all <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.ECDiffieHellmanCngPublicKey> instances.
trans-unit.target: 在所有共享此静态方法<xref:System.Security.Cryptography.ECDiffieHellmanCngPublicKey>实例。

trans-unit.source: The <paramref name="publicKeyBlob" /> or <paramref name="format" /> parameter is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="publicKeyBlob" /> 或 <paramref name="format" /> 参数为 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: The <paramref name="publicKeyBlob" /> parameter does not contain an <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.ECDiffieHellman" /> key.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="publicKeyBlob" /> 参数未包含 <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.ECDiffieHellman" /> 密钥。

trans-unit.source: An XML string that contains an Elliptic Curve Diffie-Hellman (ECDH) key.
trans-unit.target: 一个包含椭圆曲线 Diffie-Hellman (ECDH) 密钥的 XML 字符串。

trans-unit.source: Converts an XML string to an <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.ECDiffieHellmanCngPublicKey" /> object.
trans-unit.target: 将 XML 字符串转换为 <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.ECDiffieHellmanCngPublicKey" /> 对象。

trans-unit.source: An object that contains the ECDH public key that is specified by the given XML.
trans-unit.target: 一个包含 ECDH 公钥的对象，ECDH 公钥由给定的 XML 指定。

trans-unit.source: This static method is shared among all <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.ECDiffieHellmanCngPublicKey> instances.
trans-unit.target: 在所有共享此静态方法<xref:System.Security.Cryptography.ECDiffieHellmanCngPublicKey>实例。

trans-unit.source: The <paramref name="xml" /> parameter is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="xml" /> 参数为 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: The <paramref name="xml" /> parameter does not specify an <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.ECDiffieHellman" /> key.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="xml" /> 参数未指定 <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.ECDiffieHellman" /> 密钥。

trans-unit.source: Converts the <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.ECDiffieHellmanCngPublicKey" /> object to a <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.CngKey" /> object.
trans-unit.target: 将 <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.ECDiffieHellmanCngPublicKey" /> 对象转换为 <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.CngKey" /> 对象。

trans-unit.source: An object that contains the key represented by the <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.ECDiffieHellmanCngPublicKey" /> object.
trans-unit.target: 一个包含由 <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.ECDiffieHellmanCngPublicKey" /> 对象表示的密钥的对象。

trans-unit.source: Serializes the <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.ECDiffieHellmanCngPublicKey" /> public key to an XML string in RFC 4050 format.
trans-unit.target: 将 <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.ECDiffieHellmanCngPublicKey" /> 公钥序列化为 RFC 4050 格式的 XML 字符。

trans-unit.source: An XML string that contains the serialized <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.ECDiffieHellmanCngPublicKey" /> public key.
trans-unit.target: 一个包含已序列化的 <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.ECDiffieHellmanCngPublicKey" /> 公钥的 XML 字符串。

trans-unit.source: See <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.ECKeyXmlFormat.Rfc4050?displayProperty=nameWithType> for information about the XML format that this method uses.
trans-unit.target: 请参阅<xref:System.Security.Cryptography.ECKeyXmlFormat.Rfc4050?displayProperty=nameWithType>有关此方法使用 XML 格式信息。
